tweets.text: It is not getting any better. The gas stink from the landfill is increasing in intensity. A dreadful weekend and again tonight. No one should have to live like this. We are all looking for answers from @EnvAgencyMids and light at the end of this tunnel. @StinkStopthe https://t.co/JPdHJZJBqQ
Thousands of #trees planted at #BrownleeTriathlonCentre in #Leeds #yorkshire to reduce #flood risk and mitigate #climatechange #naturalfloodmanagement https://t.co/kDFFU2T0U4 https://t.co/uYcXd7xTyA

Great news! Now let's see if @EnvAgencyMids can #stopthestink from @RedIndustries2's @WalleysL Quarry Landfill in Newcastle under Lyme. Over 10,000 complaints in 6 months @ClareDinnisEA https://t.co/ardjkCX2ly

Did you see us on @bbcmtd last night? 
Our #StaffsSUNRISE river project at @StaffsUni was featured showing how wildlife is returning to this stretch!
https://t.co/1bPBqzbi5p
@WildTroutTrust @StaffsUniNews @EnvAgencyMids @SoTCityCouncil @JoGideon @AbiBrown1 @CraigBennett3 @SOTHour https://t.co/PDOvwfQxqO

tweets.text: #StopTheStink Again last night check on my kids & the stench & H2S gasses floods from there room Constant exposure of H2S to our eldest Ben can lead to further damage to his already existing brain damage with CP. Why aren't you listening! @EnvAgency @pow_rebecca @ClareDinnisEA https://t.co/q3Sxzmnk4B

tweets.text: @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency You're still allowing us to be poisoned by hydrogen sulphide though aren't you James. Even with overwhelming evidence that is causing ill health, you're still doing nothing about it.

The gas management plan that @RedIndustries2 have is not working surly this is a breach of permit, if it was been followed and fit for purpose we would not be living in gas chambers as homes #StopTheStink @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg

"As fast as possible" @ClareDinnisEA that is not the case though is it. This has been terrible for yrs but more recently the last 5 have been catastrophic. Our community has complained & begged the @EnvAgency for fresh air for the last 5 yrs My kids health is suffering from this https://t.co/FSVvxWLDuB

Absolutely foul stench from our favourite landfill tonight in the Westlands. Has to be at an unsafe level. Reported - not that it will do much as the @EnvAgency sit on their hands again @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL

@NickMincher @EnvAgencyMids Hi Nick, we'll aim to take as many questions from the phones as we can but happy to address pre-sent questions if we get a chance. 

Please send to Engagement_WestMids@environment-agency.gov.uk & if we don't get to it Wednesday we'll add it to the revised website Q&A coming soon.

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids I bought my first house 1 year ago this week (3 miles from the quarry). Due to lockdown my Dad has just had his first coffee with me inside!! ‚ò∫Ô∏è
I had to apologise as the stink started pouring in.

It usually makes me angry but now I just feel so sad...

Please fight for us Clare

urls.title: Testing and sequencing of sewage ramped up to help tackle COVID-19 outbreaks
urls.description: The innovative programme to test wastewater for traces of coronavirus (COVID-19) has ramped up sequencing capacity to support variant detection.

tweets.text:
Measurements in sewage have been mapping the spread of Covid variants across England, including the Indian variant 617.2

Read how this works, and examples of how its been used in Luton and Bristol: https://t.co/bk5ULdMUUk

Great work of @EnvAgency & @CefasGovUK scientists
